testcase.name: Jobs Home Page navigation bar links Test
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page of Jobs..................................passed When user clicks on Sign in link............................................passed Then user enters Sign in details "cool.shailendra@yahoo.com" and "test@123".passed Then user clicks on Sign in button..........................................passed Then user clicks on Find a job link.........................................passed Then user is redirected to the jobs page....................................passed Then user clicks on Jobs alerts link........................................passed Then user is redirected to the alerts page..................................passed Then user clicks on Search recruiters link..................................passed Then user is redirected to the Search Recruiters page.......................passed Then user clicks on Jobs blog link..........................................passed Then user redirected to Jobs blog page......................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
